name: Vampire Savior: EX Edition
overview: When the sun sets and humanity retreats to the imagined safety of their beds, a mysterious entity appears in the night sky to assemble the wicked and the evil. The secret power of the dark is unleashed. Eighteen supernatural creatures of myth and legend now materialize to wage their eternal war for domination of the night. Beware meager mortals as the Darkstalkers arrive, the fate of all humanity rests on who wins this epic struggle.
